original_text: Deliver to the God of Jerusalem all the articles entrusted to you for worship in the temple of your God.
korean_text: 네 하나님의 성전에서 섬기는 일을 위하여 네게 준 그릇은 예루살렘 하나님 앞에 드리고

sentences.original_text: Deliver to the God of Jerusalem
all the articles entrusted to you
for worship in the temple of your God
